title: Bonus Episode - US Secretary of Transportation Pete Buttigieg
itunes:author: Ebro In The Morning on HOT 97
itunes:summary:
United States Secretary of Transportation Pete Buttigieg sits down with Ebro in the Morning to break down the National Roadway Safety Strategy and how it will effect communities of color, plans to fix airline travel, if he can help NYC Subways improve, his thoughts on Parental Leave, the importance of Build Back Better, and more! 

All that and more on Ebro In The Morning ! 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
